page.title: 14MEDIA CONTINUED
page.content: LITERATURE Violet Cowley living in Coronation Cottages, Akeley has written her first book entitled "Over my Shoulder", price 8.25. It tells the story of her life from childhood in London, her mother's early death, thro' foster and children's home until the war. She moved to Lillingstone Lovell to become a "land girl", although her ambition was to nurse. She married Alf and moved to Akeley, they ran the Greyhound' pub which is now a private house. Since Alf's death she has lived alone. Her family and the church are the centre of her life - being church- warden for many years.
